itemListElement.name: Sriracha Chickpeas Cashew Spinach Bowl with Golden Curry Dressing

@graph.name: Sriracha Chickpeas, Cashews, Spinach Bowl with Ranch Curry Dressing
@graph.description: Sriracha Chickpeas, Cashews, Spinach Bowl with Ranch Curry Dressing. Add these Sriracha Roasted Chickpeas and Cashews to Bowls, wraps, salads. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe. Omit Cashews to make nutfree.
recipeIngredient: 15 oz can chickpeas ( or 1.5 cups cooked)
1 to 1.5 tbsp sriracha (or other hot sauce or asian chile garlic sauce)
1/2 to 1 tsp garam masala or curry powder
1/4 cup vegan ranch or vegan mayo
1/4 tsp garam masala or curry powder

recipeInstructions.text: Add chickpeas, oil, sriracha, salt, garlic, onion, garam masala in a bowl till and toss to coat. Add rice flour 1/2 tbsp at a time and mix until the mixture gets pasty and sticks to the chickpeas.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chickpeas, oil, sriracha, salt, garlic, onion, garam masala in a bowl till and toss to coat. Add rice flour 1/2 tbsp at a time and mix until the mixture gets pasty and sticks to the chickpeas.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the chickpeas on a parchment lined baking dish or sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread the chickpeas on a parchment lined baking dish or sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same bowl, mix 1 tsp sriracha, 1/2 tsp oil, 1/4 tsp garam masala and 1/4 tsp salt. Add cashews and mix to coat. Add a tsp of rice flour and mix in. Spread them on another small baking sheet .(or add them 10 mins later to the chickpea baking dish).
recipeInstructions.name: In the same bowl, mix 1 tsp sriracha, 1/2 tsp oil, 1/4 tsp garam masala and 1/4 tsp salt. Add cashews and mix to coat. Add a tsp of rice flour and mix in. Spread them on another small baking sheet .(or add them 10 mins later to the chickpea baking dish).

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 425 degrees F (218 C). Take the cashew sheet out at the 18-20 minute mark. Check the chickpeas and continue to bake until preferred crispyness.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 425 degrees F (218 C). Take the cashew sheet out at the 18-20 minute mark. Check the chickpeas and continue to bake until preferred crispyness.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the dressing: Combine all the ingredients. Thin with water if needed for a creamy dressing consistency. Taste and adjust. Add a bit of sweetener if needed. (You can also use plain cashew cream. Add some salt, pepper, onion powder, more lemon juice and dill to the cashew cream.) Or use just plain vegan ranch or Peanut Sauce to dress.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the dressing: Combine all the ingredients. Thin with water if needed for a creamy dressing consistency. Taste and adjust. Add a bit of sweetener if needed. (You can also use plain cashew cream. Add some salt, pepper, onion powder, more lemon juice and dill to the cashew cream.) Or use just plain vegan ranch or Peanut Sauce to dress.

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the bowl with spinach, raw or lightly roasted carrots, celery or cucumber, and a good helping of the chickpeas and cashews. Drizzle the dressing generously over the bowl and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble the bowl with spinach, raw or lightly roasted carrots, celery or cucumber, and a good helping of the chickpeas and cashews. Drizzle the dressing generously over the bowl and serve.
